summary:
And yet another armour mod from TheBlitz.

For females only, sevenbase.

Enjoy it.
descriptionHtml:
[center][u][i]
[/i][/u][font=Georgia][u][color=#000000]Mod name: Hell Armor.

Mod author: TheBlitz77.[/color]

[/u][/font]
[youtube]62LJ32wVfE4[/youtube]
[color=#000000][size=2]Superb video by the great,[/size][/color][color=#000000][size=3]Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/7736526/?]ChiiLLLLLLL[/url][/size][/color]


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/16728089-1427743603.jpg[/img]
[img]http://www.kephost.com/images/2016/11/12/8c8bde222c447b98846747a1337db012.jpg[/img]
[font=Georgia][color=#000000][i][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80142-0-1479149834.png[/img]

-----------------
About this mod:

This mod add a new set of Light Armors to the game (FEMALE ONLY).


Q-How can i get it??
A-Craftable section Leather.

Q-Where/when can i get it??
A-Craftable at any time/at any forge.


------------------
Installation:

-Extract the contents(only meshes folder first) into your Skyrim game folder.
-Choose only and ONLY!!! one texture file (2k or 4k).
-check the esp and play.


------------------
Uninstallation:

Uncheck the Esp first then supprime these files and the Esp of course, located in:
-Data/Meshes/TheBlitz/Armure des enfers.
-Data/Textures/TheBlitz/Armure des enfers.
-Data/Textures/cubemaps/BlackSnake_e.dds
-Data/BLITZ - Armure des enfers.esp
[/i][/color]
[/font]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80142-1-1479189769.png[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/16728089-1428257626.jpg[/img]

[font=Georgia][/font][i][font=Georgia][color=#000000]
------------------
Require:

-HdtHighHeel is required!!! during the game open the hdtHighHeel MCM, in custom height section set one of the three choices to 4.0 then click to attach.
-BBP compatible skeleton, Better to use XP32 Maximum Skeleton (for my part i use XP32 Extended).
-SevenBase Body (any version should be fine).

Opional:

-Some pieces of my two first mods are compatible with this one.


------------------
Permissions:

Please ask for my permission first, i am open to all your requests.


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80142-2-1479018632.jpg[/img]
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80142-3-1479189769.jpg[/img]
